text: “Nangni nunchan katha inleem! Dan ocha khat-um Pharisee ngai, nangni chungnga poongna omrase! ajarchu thikaraanglei, reihiing khat-um wonpuorlei ngaihi soom suungnga inkhat Pathian diang ningpeli, chongpe khaneek ah arei ka-eii minchuna ngai, akatuun, minriang khat-um ngamna hichu ningmathaan, takkha hiwarakip hi nangni'n ningthosik asuok halli aleiilak ngaihi um manilmaru.” Levi 27:30
